course_description: Explore the job of producer following stages of production with a focus on short films as an entry point. Spans concept development, prep, production and post, marketing and distribution. Learn practical, hands-on producing skills and a critical understanding of what producers do.
prerequisites: FILM 101 or FILM_OX 101 or equivalent transfer credit as prerequisite.
sections: Class Nbr: 3948, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: Th 2:30-5:30p, Instructor: D. Barba, Status: Open
